title: Just thought of a good way to nerf yasuo.
body: If a champions ult has a longer cd than yasuo's ultimate then it shouldn't be affected by his windwall.

replies.body: So you want people to have to learn the cd of every projectile ultimate in the game, at all levels, at all percentages of CDR?
Or maybe you just not blow your entire kit into his windwall?
or maybe he shouldn't be able to windwall an ultimate that can't be used in every teamfight.
Or maybe you should learn to play the game well.

It is unreasonable to assume that I am going to be better than every yasuo I come across. Isntead what I ask is that when the match is even in individual skill with the champion in question for me to have an equal chance of winning or losing regardless of matchup lest the matchup is skewed due to reasonable cause.
I'm fine with losing to a darius that is my equal 80% of the time when I am playing malphite top. this is fine. I am not fine with losing to a yasuo that is my equal 80% of the time becuase I am playing a champion that relies heavily on a high cooldown fair* ultimate in teamfights. more so because there are a lot more of those than there are of malphite esc toplaners.

*Fair meaning it is a skillshot and can be reacted to.
That's why there is a thing called baiting out his windwall.
Not every champion can do this reasonably.
List one champion that can't in the mid lane. List one.

> List one champion that can't in the mid lane. List one.

{{champion:267}} , no matter what ability you chose to bait it out do you lose a big part of your kit.
so you are only arguing something until proof is inconvenient eh?

IF we cut out the ones that ignore the windwall, this still leaves out brand. both of his projectiles need to connect.

This came to me in about a second as well I'm sure there are more.
Brand has his W to ignore the windwall, and his E so get some more please.

if brand misses his stun yasuo is not getting hit by his pillar.
unless the yasuo is significantly worse. but if we balance around imbalanced matches then we have a much more pressing matter. because that means we aren't balancing around the yasuo being much better.

I have a reasonable and acceptable nerf to yasuo we can all get behind.

Disable Yasuo's Mastery Emote.
Doesn't fit thematically even though it could be a somewhat good change.

Eh, you could just say that his windwall can't deflect things of a certain power.
Huge chunks of ice, and tidal waves going through, but not bullets or arrows.
Or if it's an ult like draven or Ezreal just lower the damage down to it's cap that it would have gotten if it hit a minion wave.
